column1: Smoque BBQ////Loved this place so much that when I moved very far south I still used their catering service. Celebrating a graduation from law school for my boyfriend
column2: the food stayed delicious and warm for the 45 min drive. There was a mishap with the order and while it inconvenienced me
column3: they addressed it and made sure to remedy the problem quickly. For the food
column5: and especially the follow up with amazing customer service- 5 stars is an easy rating. Highly recommended.
